General.Name: Cryomass Technologies Inc
General.Description: Cryomass Technologies Inc. designs, sells, and commercializes cryo-mechanical system for the handling of harvested hemp, cannabis, and other high-value plants in the United States. The company was formerly known as Andina Gold Corp. and changed its name to Cryomass Technologies Inc. in August 2021. Cryomass Technologies Inc. was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Denver, Colorado.
General.Address: 1001 Bannock Street, Denver, CO, United States, 80204
